title: MARYLAND'S MOST NOTORIOUS MURDERS 1990-2008
description: In this chilling study of Maryland murder, local Baltimore author Tia L. Lincoln gives us a powerful, hair raising, up to date collection of the most horrific murders committed in Maryland from 1990 to 2008. Serial killers, mass murderers, spree killers, psychos, teenage murderers, rapists, baby killers - all come under scrutiny in this ground breaking collection that analyzes the most heinous and baffling cases Maryland has seen in modern history. More than one hundred cases of shootings, poisonings, butcherings, beatings, burnings, even drownings. This is a spine tingling, eye popping compilation of those who help give Charm City the nickname "Body More" and whose murders are the most brutal, the most grightening and the most....fascinating.
author: Tia Lincoln
